snippet.title: Silence of the Sleep Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Silence of the Sleep Release Trailer

Silence of the Sleep is upcoming psychological horror adventure game for PC which will be released October 1, 2014 in Steam.

You play as a man called Jacob Reeves. A man who has lost his reason to live. He throws himself into a blackness to end his misery, but instead of it being the end he wakes up without a memory of his life before. 

You will travel through the abstract world of Silence of the Sleep to find the very reason for your journey...
_________________________________________

http://www.silenceofthesleep.com
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=242093102
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Silence-of-the-Sleep/706974265996346
